lenders.occupational_info: I go to school for onegrade left before geting out of there.

lenders.occupational_info: I make and sell clothing, soap, candles, and accessories.

lenders.name: Eddie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are working hard to help themselves and provide for their famlies.

lenders.name: jean
lenders.loan_because: it is important to help each other in this world. we are all the same with just different needs and wants. feels good to help an other person
lenders.occupational_info: do volunteer work as I have retired from doing office work. where ever I feel good  a situation I try to give some time and knowledge

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: I like helping other people.

lenders.name: Wendy

lenders.name: Emma & Sean
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I believe our greatest mission in this world is to help each other.

lenders.name: Chris

lenders.occupational_info: I perform financial audits for the global hospitality company, Wyndham Worlwide and I'm an independent travel agent.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a sustainable, compassionate and equitable world.
lenders.occupational_info: : helping communities achieve sustainability goals.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I used to be homeless and unemployed. Someone helped me and now I have a good home and great job.  I want to 'pay it forward'.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people whose hearts have been hurt.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: Because there is greater value to be had from my money then the value I gain by hording it.

lenders.name: Mark, Karen and kids
lenders.loan_because: We're very fortunate to have a healthy, happy family. We want to help others achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Life has been good to me. It's time to share.
lenders.occupational_info: Former broadcast news anchor/reporter with WNBC, CBS Radio and CBC Radio and Television. Now retired.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.  By helping just one person, you can in effect help an entire family.  I loan because it's better to give than receive. I loan because it feels like the right thing to do. I loan because I care.

lenders.name: Natalia
lenders.loan_because: If I can do some good for someone then I have done my job. Thank you Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I am attending college right now and will hopefully become a teacher.

lenders.name: Jenkins Family
lenders.loan_because: We live fortunate lives in Canada.  We simply want to share our good fortune with those who need it.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I help determine the value of property

lenders.name: Esther
lenders.loan_because: I can sit in my living room and make a difference in a stranger's life.   Wireless philanthropy thanks to KIVA.  Wonderful.
lenders.occupational_info: I put a roof over my family 's collective head by editing movies.  I also make my own cool films, but more as a labor of love.  I'm stuck in a dark room all day surrounded by computer and video equipment secretly longing for the great outdoors but I enjoy what I do, most of the time and the cost of living is high in LA so... I'll be spending a lot more time cooped up in a dark room.

lenders.name: Marylynne
lenders.loan_because: I want to feel that I am contributing in some small way to make this world just a little bit better!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired senior and have a very limited income but see it as my duty to give back to society and help others, no matter how small it is!

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a scientist who manages a group of people working on clean energy and clean water projects at the Palo Alto Research Center.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for checking business operations and records for proper execution and ensure company's assets are safeguarded.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.occupational_info: Student. Future career possibly in energy efficient building design and/or sustainable energy solutions.

lenders.name: Matt and Jillian
lenders.loan_because:
The best way to help someone escape extreme poverty is to give them the tools they need to support themselves. 

It is easy to feel like there isn't a way to help people in developing countries when you are half a world away,  but Kiva is an easy and simple way to change lives (without even leaving your home!)

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that I can help other people have their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult  with people interested in how to use the internet for business both now and in the future ;-)

lenders.name: Shell Dockly
lenders.loan_because: Life is short so love one another and help wherever & whenever you can.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my health, food ,water, and shelter and a job that  covers all  my expenses. I am so richly blessed and I wish the same for others.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: Because... I have a little that can be part of a lot. Where else can $25 have such an impact on the success of a business and peoples' lives?  I'm pleased to be part of their dream and success.  Kiva is a brilliant idea!

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate for the opportunities that I have been given, and am happy to have the chance to help provide opportunities for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an organization that researches treatements for liver disease.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.occupation: Director of Marketing for a Hospice Company
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to see their dreams become reality.

lenders.name: The RadNattas

lenders.occupational_info: Until recently, I worked as a teacher of young children. Now, I am studying International Security. I want to learn how to help break the poverty cycle in all places.

lenders.occupational_info: Making my way the best I know how.

lenders.name: LaSane
lenders.loan_because: TO HELP GENERATE BUSINESSES GLOBAL

lenders.occupational_info: I started lending with Kiva as a poor uni student. Now I am a mum of 2, plus my niece and still using that same money to lend to other Kiva participants.

lenders.name: Sarah

lenders.name: Rachel

lenders.occupational_info: Worthwhile, fulfilling, stressful at times, enjoyable, GREAT!

lenders.name: KJE
lenders.loan_because: I received assistance to start up my own business many years ago. It gives me great pleasure to now be in a position to help others do the same.

lenders.name: Chloe
lenders.loan_because: I feel I can make a difference to other people's lives who are in need...
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student, studying in high school in my last year!

lenders.loan_because: I don't have heaps of money but it's still more than some have.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm from Sydney Australia, married with one daughter. 
I'm a stay at home mum as I care for my gorgeous daughter who is disabled and I work when I can 
-:¦:-•:*'"*:•.-:¦:-•HAVE A GREAT DAY•-:¦:-•:*'''*:•-:¦:-

lenders.name: Christie
lenders.loan_because: Someone gave me a loan to get started and while I haven't paid it all back yet, I still want to give to others.  I also believe that we are called to give and so I'm just answering that call in small ways.  Maybe one day I can answer it in larger ways.
lenders.occupational_info:
First and foremost, I am a wife and a mother.  My son is 3 yrs old and my daughter is 8 months old and they take up a lot of my time :).  I love it. 

In the last few months I have started importing scrapbook and crafting supplies from China and the USA to Australia.  I sell them on ebay and at local markets.  My hope is to help pay off our mortgage and enable our family to give more to others.  I love having this small business on the side.  I'm doing something that I think benefits others - directly or indirectly.

lenders.name: Margot
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I look after 2 very energetic primary age children.

lenders.name: Kristy
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying law at the University of Sydney

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Lisa Jane
lenders.loan_because: Life Purpose !

lenders.name: Janetta
lenders.loan_because: It is one way of helping others to achieve, I believe we are all one big family
lenders.occupational_info: I have just finished work after 42 years, now its time for me to relax

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: To give others the oppertunity to have a better life. We are very fortunate and we don't realise how difficult it can be for others in this situation.

lenders.name: Tania
lenders.loan_because: the idea of giving someone a loan rather than a hand out gives them a lot more self worth and empowerment.  People are responsible for the money themselves and i think it will help them achieve even bigger dreams because other people believe in them!

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: it helps others to achieve better things for themselves and their community.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I can. It's such a small thing for one person to do that can have such a huge impact on someone elses life
lenders.occupational_info: I co-ordinate help to travellers who get sick or injured while travelling.

lenders.name: Jayden
lenders.loan_because: I am young and i feel that i need to help people that are less off than me and i didnt know how to go about it then i found KIVA. kiva is just a fantastic way to give pople that chance that thay need to make somthing of there lives.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: I want my granddaughter to live in a fairer world, and we all have an obligation to do our best to change what we can for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: As an accountant I help small businesses to grow.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference to the lives of people. It a great experience to create and develop your own business and set the standards and service you want to provide for people and  it is a great way to create a lifestyle that works for you.
lenders.occupational_info: I recruit people for employment to organisations primarily in the Community Service and Health Sector as well as for some corporations.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it gives the opportunity to give someone the ability to achieve their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a supermarket working  with computers and rearranging products on shelves  with company reps. and Duty Management

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I have been a single mother now remarried with 5 children. I have been helped along the way many times so its my turn to help. Happy mothers with self worth have happy children.
lenders.occupational_info: Busy mother of five . Have small farm.Horses Cows chickens & vegetables . Happy husband happy animals happy children and happy life.

lenders.name: Rajinder
lenders.loan_because: in my lifetime I'd like to make a difference to at least one person's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I counsel people who have issues that are overwhelming for them, enabling them to create healthy lives by utilising their own resources.

lenders.name: Briony
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone should have the opportunity to be successful and be able to provide for their family. If my small donation can help someone give their family a better life, I have achieved my goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell holidays.

lenders.name: Jodie
lenders.loan_because: It is the little things that make a difference.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help at some time in their life. I have so it's my turn to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I love what I do - I do my best to help people emotionally and physically with massage - I find it a very rewarding career.

lenders.name: Janine
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give to people that cant afford the things that we take for granted

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I can help another person/family to better their life
lenders.occupational_info: I help sick and lame horses to get back to health

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: People throughout the world should have the same opportunities to provide a quality and sustainable lifestyle for their family regardless of their race and origin. Micro loans gives us the opportunity to help our fellow man to provide those opportunities.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: if I can make someones day a little lighter then I'm all for that..........xkc

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: “We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop.” Mother Teresa

lenders.name: Danni
lenders.loan_because: We are put on earth to help each other on our journey.  Kiva is a fun and easy and inexpensive way to bless someone who needs some support.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a single mum to three precious children :-)

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: It's a blessing to be able to give.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: Its easy, very little cost and helps small business people who are giving it a go but may not be able to obtain a loan otherwise.
lenders.occupational_info: Registration of  people/company's trade marks/brands in Australia and around the world so they have exclusive rights to their names and avoid business name identity theft.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: the world needs it.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: When it rains, it doesn't rain everywhere, but everyone needs water.The water in the mountains is piped to people in the valley who received no rain.  Material wealth is the same, it rains in different places and God expects us to share the wealth.  Ensign 9/06 P77  .

lenders.name: kathy
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my blessings with others both locally and globally.

lenders.name: Triphina
lenders.loan_because: Giving is a blessing and I realise that there are many out there doing it tough so if we all do our bit no matter how big or small we are helping to ensure those less fortunate are in a position to help themselves and others.  It's about letting that Love flow.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to improve the quality of the health service for users.

lenders.name: Nichole
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to make a real contribution to others less fortunate and assist others in reaching their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Administration of government grant funds to Australian Indigenous Organisations.

lenders.name: Olwyn
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by the story on Oprah
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 11 and 12 year old children in a Government school in Canberra - Australia.

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: Self employed provider of bookkeeping & business services

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: we are all a part of humanity. Only together do we truly embody the love of God.
lenders.occupational_info: I help teenagers develop faith in God and communicate their mistakes do not define who you are.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It lets me express my commitment to addressing hunger and development issues in a personal way.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing spiritual care for persons with life limiting illnesses.

lenders.name: Graham & Nella
lenders.loan_because: I think it is better to help people self help than to give handouts.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: In some small way, I am able to help those who do not have the benefits of a wealthy society. I display a bumper sticker on my car which reads 'Practice Random acts of Kindness' and I strive to do this every single day.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a volunteer palliative care support worker.
My role is to support the 'client' who has a life threatening illness and the family. I do this by home visits to the client, so that the carer can take some  mucn needed respite, I also visit patients in the palliative care ward of my local hospital

lenders.name: Di Pollard
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am blessed to be healthy, living by the sea, making and creating and sharing my good fortune.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Because I can, I guess I take for granted how lucky I am sometimes I am happy to help someone who genuinely needs it.

lenders.name: Lucy-Anne
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my sons that there is "greater pleasure in giving than receiving".   I want to help others help themselves, and I love to help when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: First and foremost I'm mum to 3 beautiful boys and wife to Brendan.   I work in the airline industry.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: I wanna make a difference for someone in this world

lenders.name: Flora
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because:
I wish people to be independent and 
successful
and happy.
this opportunity starts people toward these.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a salesman for an software company.

lenders.name: Sally L
lenders.occupation: I\'m a full time Mum & I also work part time

lenders.name: Mariane and Len Ruvinsky
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people who are less fortunate than us.
lenders.occupational_info: Mariane is a Certified Medical Assistant.  I work in the Neurology Dept at Dartmouth-Hitchcock Medical Center in Manchester, NH.  Len is an Engineer in the defense industry in Nashua, NH.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I CAN!  I appreciate the life I have and want others to have good lives also.  It's feels good to help out.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: Like most everybody I struggle to deal with everyday bills and issues, and forget about those less fortunate in other locations who even with just a little support can make a major impact to the lives of their family and broader community. I am sure that they will reciprocate in like measure to the best of their ability if afforded the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop voice and data solutions for satellite telephones that enable their wider application to enable emergency responders to deal man-made and natural disasters faster and more effectively.greg@pacificrimusa.net

lenders.name: Abi & Marty
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Valarie
lenders.loan_because: I want to end poverty and the associated suffering in the world.

lenders.name: Sophia
lenders.loan_because: WHY NOT?  it feels great to know your making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Im a Registered Nurse, i work in a hospital.

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.

lenders.name: leo
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand every now and then.

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: though to us our lives may at times seem hard, it make me realise that there are many people less fortunate than us in the world, and the we in Australia are very lucky.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a married mother of 4 gorgeous children.2 boys and 2 girls.I have been lucky enough to have been with my husband for 17 years and married to him for 10 of those years.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I have been in the position myself where I have had a great idea for a business, but had no funding. Imagine how different the world would be if everyone had the ability to develop their ideas? Also, I live in Australia. Our quality of life is ridiculously high. Fifty bucks to us is a carton of beer.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a graphic designer. I mainly specialise in logo designs and packaging design. I am also interested in writing, drawing, painting.

Find me on facebook. Daniel Abela.

lenders.name: Stella & Samson
lenders.loan_because: it would be great to help people be able to stand on their feet fiancially secure, and keep on giving by investing in the future.

lenders.name: Jacquie
lenders.loan_because: I can and I believe in good karma.  It's nice to know that just a LITTLE bit of money actually can make a BIG difference in somebody else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get loans for houses.  They come to me to help them find the best loan, instead of having to speak with several bank managers to find a good loan.  I don't actually give the money, I just help them with all the paperwork, and talk to the lenders for them. I save them time and money.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much but I am lucky to have what I do have.  So what I can do is share and help a dream come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I did work at a school before I had my first child, love working with children and watching them grow.  Now I am watching and teaching my child grow into a fine young adult.

lenders.name: GuardedGal
lenders.loan_because: I am committed to giving back to the global community from which I have learned so much over the years

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: There is no excuse not to!

lenders.name: julianne and Rick
lenders.loan_because: i want to teach my children that they are very lucky to have what they have, and that there are children around the world that don't even have a bat and ball, let alone a tv, play station, wii, laptop and so on... So now my 5 lovely's are going to save there silver, to help other families get what they need in life.  Unfortunetly we don't have alot of money to help everyone, but if we can help in a tiny way then it will make the whole family happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and raise our 5 children while my partner runs his own business

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: To help others suceed
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Maths to secondary students

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves global assistance to better their lives and to find happiness and pride in what they do.

lenders.name: Steve & Traci
lenders.loan_because: We have visited developing countries and want to make a real difference.  Every person in the world deserves the chance to realise their dreams, and to live a happy life.
lenders.occupational_info: Steve designs and draws plans for the construction of buildings and houses.  Traci is having some time off work.  We live in Queensland, Australia.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: To overcome poverty, we must encourage human initiative and free-enterprise.
lenders.occupational_info: Geography student.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I think the only thing better than helping people is helping them help themselves.  Love to see confidence and self esteem develop, especially in girls and women.
lenders.occupational_info: Single mum, full time student.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's better to teach a person to fish, than give a person a fish.  Also people don't need charity, they need inspiration and the means to build a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: A small donation can make a world of difference to people in need. In this country we are so fortunate. Its not asking alot of anyone to give to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Video, Photo and Music business. Mostly weddings, but also corporate and small jobs within the community.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I saw it on Oprah and i can't really afford to donate money  just yet, but I can lend $25 no probs, so I checked out the site and thought why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the reception desk in the ward of a private hospital and organise all of the doctors and nurses records and results and welcome patients when they arrive and see them out the door as they leave.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of someone not as fortunate as I am.

lenders.name: Shanntelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to see change in the world and to help people provide for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: It's a pleasure for my daughter and me to share with other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people in organisations and businesses to listen and speak to each other, and make plans for a sustainable future.

lenders.name: Bernadette and Natalie
lenders.loan_because:
Natalie (10 years old says: "I loan because I have the chance to have been born in a family that lives in a nice place where they can give me presents and I think that other people that weren't born with that chance should still have it.
Bernadette says:  I loan because I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: We live in Paris where Natalie (10) goes to a French school and I am an entrepreneur having founded Visibility Branding where I help entrepreneurs and individuals develop a strategy to build, market and express their brand.

lenders.name: Megan & Kenyon
lenders.occupation: Receptionist for Adult Community Education College
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to live below the poverty line.  I was a single mother & was not eligible to get a loan.  I now have a job, my son is 20 & I have a very supportive partner.  I want to share my good fortune with others.  I believe in wealth distribution throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer phones and book people into courses at our college.  I also work on the computer, do filing and other office tasks

lenders.name: Keng
lenders.loan_because: I thought this was a great idea and would like to help. look forward to be a permanent lender lending more and more!

lenders.name: Joseph & Melanie
lenders.loan_because: It's what Jesus called us to do.  Plus, we love people, and want to bless them as God blesses us! :)

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I just registered and want to learn a lot more about Kiva.  I will be loaning soon.  I like to help people who are willing to work to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a web developer and am looking to see how I can best promote Kiva on the web sites and in the newsletters I send out.
Current sites include:
http://www.carsalesasia.com
http://www.deep-field-relaxation.com
http://www.motorcycleasia.net
http://www.mcpfederation.com
http://www.bantayturista.com
etc

lenders.name: Joe, Athena & Alexandria
lenders.loan_because: "whatever you do to the least of my brothers I will do unto you"
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in the minning industry, wife works as a medical physician and our 
"jewel in the crown" is in university.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I have a very fortunate life and would like to help to make a difference

lenders.name: Swingkitten
lenders.loan_because: i want to encourage people to achieve their goals

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to take control and better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people.

lenders.name: DONNA
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves the chance to support their family and build their economy.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someones life. They have so little, we have so much. We should all be helping to make a difference in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate that my husband has a good income and I can stay at home with my 3 kids.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.occupational_info: I work at The Advertiser since Aug'10. Prior to this I use to be a carer

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: i care

lenders.name: Eliesha
lenders.loan_because: I want to be an active member part of  our global community and I am in a position where I can share what I have to help other people make a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker or support worker. I work with all types of different people to help them get their lives on track.

lenders.name: Laura

lenders.occupational_info: I am developing a first aid course for mental illness - how to help someone who is unhappy, distressed or traumatised.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women have a chance and this loaning system offers them a way do to so by helping themselves.....
lenders.occupational_info: Customer Service in local Government

lenders.name: Marg
lenders.loan_because: We all need  the opportunity to be able to support our family's. My small amount can make a big difference in so many life's.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: seinfeldesque
lenders.loan_because: it feels nice to help.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I want to give the opportunity to people to help themselves to a better life

lenders.name: shelley
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in a more disadvtanged environment than me.  I am time poor due to having 2 small children and pregnant with another child so this way I can loan money and see how my recipients do good and flourish in business.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and look after my 2 children aged 2 and 3.  I feel i am very fortunate to be in a position to be able to afford to stay at home and care for them.

lenders.name: Ronny
lenders.loan_because: of the old saying... "Give a man a fish, feed him for a day; teach a man to fish, feed him for a lifetime" and what better way than to give money to those who can use these resources to help improve their lives.  And because I am truly blessed I want to give to others

lenders.name: Lourdes & Candace Rose
lenders.loan_because: I believe in being of service to those I love and to the world.  This is an opportunity for me to contribute to someone I may otherwise never have met or had the chance to help.  Maybe their dreams will come true!!
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to people's personal stories and help them find a better way to live if they so wish.

lenders.name: Lucia
lenders.loan_because: At some point in our lives, we all may need a helping hand.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: its nice to be able to help others

lenders.name: Ron & Lorraine
lenders.loan_because:
It is an easy way to help others become self sufficient and give others a helping hand when they need it. 
Living in the "Lucky Country" and being able to help others is a reward in it self.

lenders.name: josie
lenders.loan_because: I love to give others the opportunity to thrive and prosper and help their families
lenders.occupational_info: Artist

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupational_info: work in a large hotel checking rooms before a new guest stays for the night

lenders.name: solange Andrade
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone improve their life and their childrens lives.

lenders.name: Lovestamp
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle and have a dream that you want to see fulfilled. If I can help, even a tiny bit, then at least I have done something, and maybe just maybe one day they can pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info:
First and foremost I am a mum to 2 gorgeous children, a daughter and a son.
 I also have an internet business that I run on ebay selling recycled clothing. Also we have a small business that we have been running for 3 years.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is such an easy way to help people in need to become self sufficient.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: it's the least i can do!

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: What goes around comes around.

lenders.name: The Glavic Family

lenders.occupational_info: I look after my five year old daughter and three year old son on a full-time basis. I also maintain my household as my husband works full-time on his own business.

lenders.name: gvidas

lenders.occupational_info: Administrative work in institute of physics

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I want to...

lenders.name: Alessandro E. H.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with technology helping people send money to each other on the internet.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to live the life they want.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a music teacher and teach children aged 6-13.

lenders.name: Helene
lenders.loan_because: I've been looking for a way to help and find this a great idea
lenders.occupational_info: I work with account managers on their National portfolios in providing day to day assistance to them and their clients.

lenders.name: Hellen
lenders.loan_because: At some time in our lives we ALL need a helping hand. I am full of admiration for all these people who are working tirelessly to support their families. I applaud you.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: this is one way that I can love Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: There are so many good people in the world that just need a little help. I love the idea that I have the ability to give someone a better chance at success & happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Teaching Assistant of Instructional Technology at a primary school, which means that I teach kids ages 5 - 8 how to use computers & technology to supplement their education.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: I think it will make a bigger impact than giving to local charities
lenders.occupational_info: I work for global networking company

lenders.name: Pussen
lenders.loan_because: I am working on a start up a hospitality venture in South Africa.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an aspiring entrepreneur with plans to develop a hospitality and tourism venture.

lenders.name: Bridgette
lenders.loan_because: it is my goal to become a better humanitarian to my world community...Knowing I have helped my fellow man is so empowering. I have recieved so much joy, love and gratitude for just being able to help another.
lenders.occupational_info: The job that I do is very negative. I meet people at the worst times in their lives. It has been my goal to leave the individuals that I deal with some self respect. I have to remember that at the end of the day we are ALL GODS children and should be treated accordingly.

lenders.name: Audrey
lenders.loan_because: I love the fact that a single donation can help several people over time and that my donation isn't just going into a charitable abyss. Great job Kiva!

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: It is my greatest pleasure to pay it forward for all the kindness and support that I have received as I built my business. I have been fortunate to be raised in a country that allows women to achieve great things and I want everyone in the world to be able to have the same opportunities that I have had.

lenders.name: Denyse
lenders.loan_because: I am truly blessed in my life and would love to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: My most  important work is ensuring that my son grows up in a giving, loving, peaceful world.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: I manage music artists and put on live music shows.

lenders.name: Mr. Thornton
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an 8th grade homeroom class of 28 nice students at Sierra Middle School in Parker, Colorado.

lenders.name: mabel
lenders.loan_because: because  planning to have business which i used  to do in the philippines  and the only problem is that i dont have enought money to start.
lenders.occupational_info: my job is hard i worked swing ship start at 8:00 clock at night to 4:00 in the morning which its hard for me having a kid get up early and  bring it to school. im terrible tired of being night worker

lenders.name: Robert & Katherine
lenders.loan_because: With the many blessings we enjoy, it is important to share them with others.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: it's great to lend a hand
lenders.occupational_info: I help organising big events and festivals with music, dance..great cultural events that are popular with young people in England.

lenders.name: Kazuhiro & Motome
lenders.loan_because:
We think this idea of lending money to people who want to start business or improve their business for a better life for themselves and for their family is much more better idea than just donating to an organization.  And also because we are blessed in so many ways that we think we should do something in return.

We wish you all the best with your business!

lenders.name: John and Patrice
lenders.loan_because: As entrepreneurs we appreciate the need for  startup and expansion support  for small businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: We coach  and train people to make the most of their lives.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: my sister helped me to help you...
lenders.occupational_info: I do the accounting for commercial rental properties.

lenders.occupational_info: I am currently attending college and learning to work on computers.  I also work in a sandwich restaurant to support myself.

lenders.name: Brent

lenders.name: adrienne
lenders.loan_because: I love Kiva and the work it does!
lenders.occupational_info: Criminal Justice

lenders.name: Mike

lenders.occupational_info: We are seventh grade students.  We raised money by selling baked goods and woven "school spirit" bracelets.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Ang & Carol
lenders.loan_because: It seems like an easy, effective way to make a difference for someone and help promote world friendship and understanding.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired symphony musician and retired banker

lenders.name: Roozbeh
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes all people need to improve their lives is a small loan-

lenders.name: Chris and Simone

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: if you can afford to, why wouldn't you?  Lead by example.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: We love to make a difference!

lenders.name: Randi
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much money myself, by North American standards, so I can appreciate the efforts of others to simply get by.
lenders.occupational_info: I grow vegetables and fruits for my family, and as an artist I do photography, relief printmaking, and bookbinding by hand. Also, I have recently returned to my former business of selling handknit clothing.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Simply because I have the funding and others don't.  I enjoy helping those in need.

lenders.name: Antony
lenders.loan_because: I've been very lucky and wish to share my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: we want to share our success in the textiles industry
lenders.occupational_info: We screen print on textiles that are sweatshop free. We print for clients who design their own clothing lines and businesses and special events that want to work with a printer who is committed to workers rights and the environment.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve independence and support their families through owning their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a hospital in the United States, and I take care of sick infants.

lenders.name: Global Ventures LLC
lenders.loan_because:
People all over the world want to work.  Kiva! provides some wonderful people the opportunity to realize their dreams...both the lenders and the borrowers.

"Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along." 
- Napoleon Hill  

"Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending." 
- Carl Bard 

"A small trouble is like a pebble. Hold it too close to your eye and it fills the whole world and puts everything out of focus. Hold it at a proper distance and it can be examined and properly classified. Throw it at your feet and it can be seen in its true setting, just one more tiny bump on the pathway of life." 
- Celia Luce
lenders.occupational_info: Deliver and Inspire

lenders.name: Heath
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of recruiters

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Its such a simple thing to do. It costs less than a dinner out for me. Yet, it can make such a difference. How often can one person really do that? Here is my chance, and yours too...
lenders.occupational_info: I help the software developers make the software the best it can be.

lenders.name: Sean & Liz
lenders.occupational_info: I attempt to alter US public policy to make products safer for women and children.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: Businesses are good for entrepreneurs, their families and their communities.

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because: A connection I have for folks all over the world who have an entrepreneurial spirit and are trying to better themselves and their families financially.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a sales and service organization in the insurance business.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.occupation: Operations Manager at an Insurance Agency
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.loan_because: hopefully it's a way to help people progress.

lenders.name: Sharon

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful thing to do and it does not cost that much to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a local newspaper. There are days when my work is a little stressful but I love it.

lenders.name: Laila

lenders.name: Ariel
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: It fits the type of program I believe is very beneficial.

lenders.name: Cara
lenders.loan_because: it amazes me how something so small in our country can make such a difference in another country.

lenders.name: Lindsey

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people in need
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher.  I have a lot of life and caring in me so I spend much of my time helping people

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: This is a way that I can make a small contribution that has the potential to make a significant impact on someone's life.  It's a reminder that we are one world.  And it makes me smile to do it.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: i believe in micro_economics
lenders.occupational_info: I am living in pattaya

lenders.name: Jan(et)
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance -- an opportunity to rise out of difficult circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, but before that I worked as a Judicial Secretary with the Court of Appeals of KY.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: It doesn't take alot of money to make a big difference in a persons life

lenders.name: Mitul
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Pediatrician interested in helping the less fortunate

lenders.name: stephen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to people that have the capacity to make a difference for themselves but lack the funds to take the initial first step.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a consulting business helping small and large companies manage risk and control.

lenders.name: Debbie Freeland
lenders.loan_because: If circumstances were reversed, I'd want someone to help me.
lenders.occupational_info: I copyedit and proofread college and nonfiction textbooks.

lenders.name: Kimberley
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Risk management

lenders.name: Paige
lenders.loan_because: I can and it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am blessed to be able to stay home and raise my three young children (6, 4, 2 ys.).

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: There are so many people across the world that just need someone to care for them and give them a head start in life.
lenders.occupational_info: As i am a stay at home mum, my day is filled with love and happiness as i cherish every moment with my son.

lenders.name: Jodie
lenders.loan_because: Where there's a will - we should each help one another find a way

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because:
i have more than what is essential to survive...
i feel its my obligation to help others who truly are in need.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is the best way to alleviate poverty in developing countries.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I started from a gift certificate and I enjoy it and have continued to add more.

lenders.name: GenerationWonder
lenders.loan_because: we support sustainable livelihoods and because it gives us  great pleasure to connect with others in this way.
lenders.occupational_info: Fair Trade and Eco Business

lenders.name: Hillary
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Assist companies and government agencies implement environmental programs.

lenders.name: H Douglas
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the private support of small markets.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell meat, poultry and provisions to hotels, restaurants, clubs, and yachts.

lenders.name: Rio Americano Kiva Club
lenders.loan_because: The concept is simply amazing & what $25 can do to one person can help others too.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because:
Given that I have been born in a first world country with lots of opportunity, I think that it is important that I use what ever resourses are available to me to help out those in the developing world that don't have access to the opportunities that I have.  I also feel that this is a fantastic opportunity to not just donate money, but to donate money to people that will use this money to improve their lives and enhance their ability to improve their earning ability which will open up more opportunities for them. 

As the saying says: " Buy a man a fish and he will eat for the day, teach a man to fish and he will eat for a lifetime"

lenders.name: Jodi, Jack, and Lily
lenders.loan_because: It is a great lesson for my children and it feels good to give!

lenders.name: Michael Hurst
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to struggle against all odd's. I havent had it as tough as some here requesting loans, but I can help them a little to achive their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Water Treatment Industry. I clean mud and nasties out of the water to make it crystal clean and safe to drink.

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: You reap what you sow
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mum with two children, and I study psychotherapy part-time

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.loan_because: I have always been blessed in my life. It is only right that I attempt to share my blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large home improvement based retail store. I sell major appliances and some small appliances to individuals, property managers and builders.

lenders.name: Steph
lenders.loan_because: i am a single mum and i am grateful for everything i have and the opportunities i have had and wish to pass on something to help another person achieve their dreams also.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a the Coordinator for a church-based Community Service in Adelaide, South Australia. We give away free groceries to disadvantaged people to help them feed their families. We establish relationship with these people in order to guide and encourage them to find opportunites in which to improve their lives and become self sufficient. We are a Christian church-based service and endeavour to show God's love through what we do. We believe that we are God's hands and feet literally.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I love that I can connect with people half a world away.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working on exciting medical technology that can help paralyzed and locked-in people walk and talk.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can and should.  It's my social obligation.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell commercial flooring and installation services.  I like my job because I'm a "people person" and I get to meet lots of interesting people. Plus I am not stuck in an office all day. :-)

lenders.name: RICHY & ALLY
lenders.loan_because: IT'S A GREAT FEELING TO GIVE A LITTLE!!

lenders.name: Callie
lenders.loan_because: it's fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I raise $$ for cancer research

lenders.name: Alanah
lenders.loan_because: Kiva not only allows you to help others help themselves but you can actually see your loan changing the lives of others.

lenders.name: Collins
lenders.loan_because: we are called to demonstrate Godly character..."clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience..." Col. 3:12
lenders.occupational_info: I have recently married a wonderful man, Jared, and we are currently in transition to move to China to pursue his international business employment.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: it's the best retail therapy EVER!

lenders.name: Peg & Denise
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate to have so much!!  We would like to share it and help others make their lives better.

lenders.name: Angus & Sean
lenders.loan_because: We were lucky to be born in a prosperous country where we have everything we need.  Our parents want us to learn that our good fortune is a privilege and teach us how we can help others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now 9 and am in grade 4 this year and my brother Sean is 6 years old and in grade 1. We've been loaning now since I was 3 and Sean was 5 mnths old!

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: this is a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in financial markets.

lenders.name: Rashmi
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone get the freedom to live their life and be in control of it.
lenders.occupational_info: My job involves working with people and especially those that are disadvantaged. I believe that I would not like to hurt another human being knowingly and if I can assist them in any then I am blessed.

lenders.name: Savahna
lenders.loan_because:
Because I have been given must I to must give,
Because of thy great bounty Lord each day I live,
I shall divide my gifts from thee with every brother that i see,
Who has the need of help from me.

Because I have been sheltered fed by thy good care, 
I cannot see another's lack and I not share,
My glowing fire my loaf of bread my roofs safe shelter over head,
That he too may be comforted.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a single parent living in Australia looking after my three little girls

lenders.name: Team Casey
lenders.loan_because: even one person can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with an agency that develops internship programs to help companies and college students connect with each other.  My husband works in Sales for Procter & Gamble.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.occupation: Founder of a nonprofit creating teen entrepreneurs

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Bian
lenders.loan_because: I often give to other charities but always wish I could see the direct results - this way I can keep track of exactly who I am helping and why! Also it's fantastic that when it is repaid I can then make that money work for someone else!
lenders.occupational_info: I am working as a nurse but will be starting my new career as a music teacher in primary schools next year.

lenders.name: Audrey
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to make a HUGE difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that hospital operating rooms have what they need to perform surgery.
